ComicInfo.Summary:
Brooks decides it's time to break out the heavy firearms. Ben, Polly, and Puffy go on a mission of their own that results in a sincere heart-to-heart... and the whole KIDZ crew takes a trip to the abandonded "Super Toyz" retail store for what should be a super fun time... but turns into something else entirely!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A (Stranger Things Parody) | Esdras Cristobal | 1 | B | Cover B | Steve Baker | 2 | C | Cover C (Jaws Parody) | Jocelyn Joret | 3 | D | Cover D | Andrea Scoppetta | 4 |
